code: var ToDoReducer=function ToDoReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"SET_TODOS":return action.todos;default:return state;}};var tokenReducer=function tokenReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"LOG_OUT":return state=null;case"SAVE_TOKEN":return action.token;default:return state;}};export{tokenReducer,ToDoReducer};
